ABOUT END OF THE ROLL MISSISSAUGA STORE

Our spacious flooring store proudly serves the community in Mississauga West. We offer excellent brand names in flooring for hardwood, cork flooring, area rugs, laminate, vinyl, or carpet - and a showroom full of flooring inventory.

We Know Flooring
The Store opened in 2009 and the team is extremely experienced when it comes to flooring solutions. “Our priority is to do everything to ensure complete customer satisfaction. We even offer a free 'Shop at Home' service and are happy to go our of our way from the beginning to the end of your flooring project," says the owners. The team members include Flooring Advisors Zubair Rashid and Brett Adams, Warehouse Associate Vicky Mander, Owners and Managers Shitij Malik and Mukesh Narula. They all work hard and are committed to finding fantastic deals on new and timeless products, and offer customers the best flooring at low prices.

Huge Floor Selection, Low Prices
We have a comprehensive selection of brand name flooring already in stock, and you can find a list of some of our brands here. To get some ideas, have a look at our online room scenes, and bring your favourites to the store so we can show you some floor options. Remember, what you'll find online is not necessarily complete, and there is way more to choose from in store. We also offer monthly promotions and the clearance items that change regularly, so you can always find a great deal to take home today. To read up on different flooring topics, check out our Flooring Guide.

Flooring for Every Budget
Try our handy cost calculator. We are happy to provide storage as well, if you take advantage of a discount but need to wait a few weeks for flooring installation. Click here for measuring tips, design tips, and useful questions to consider.

You Are Invited
Our friendly staff in Mississauga West will be happy to service all of your flooring needs. Whether you are looking for hardwood, cork flooring, area rugs, laminate, vinyl, or carpet, we're sure to have something in stock that will suit your needs and meet your budget. Drop by for a browse and see why we are known as Canada's Flooring Leader. End Of The Roll is proud to be locally owned and operated.

profile:
Unlike many other radiant providers, Radiant Sole is proud to focus exclusively on in-floor hydronic radiant floor heating systems.

At Radiant Sole, we pride ourselves on our work ethic and the quality of our work. The entire rough-in stage, which consists of insulating the space with R-11 insulation and running grade-A PEX pipes, is typically completed in a single day. With Radiant Sole, you can be certain that you are getting an unparalleled level of quality at a surprisingly affordable price.

We look forward to hearing more about your project. In many cases we can suggest ideas that lead to the most efficient layout, in-turn lowering the overall cost of the system.

Give us a call or send us an email and we'll be in touch right away! Thanks for visiting our page.

More Information about Radiant Sole:

Our team has years of experience designing and installing beautiful hydronic radiant floor heating systems in the GTA. We quickly and efficiently install everything from basement systems to more complex systems including heating of the upper levels of your home. We take great pride in delivering a high quality, beautiful finished product.

Straightforward process:

We use extremely high-quality R-11 insulation and grade-A PEX pipe for the first step of the project, the rough-in. Our insulation doesn’t require messy wire mesh, leaving behind a clean, flat surface ready for the concrete slab. As soon as a heat source is installed, we return to assemble the manifold - the brain behind the system. This is what we call the hookup. You have the option of setting multiple temperature zones with separate thermostats controlling each zone.

profile:
About Us
Hausvio Inc is a leading Toronto-based home renovations company. We pride ourselves on our eco-friendly, innovative, and professional approach to all of our home renovation projects. From a brand new kitchen or bathroom to whole house projects, our team works hard to transform your living spaces completely.
​
We believe in a more personal approach to home renovation projects. By working closely with our clients, understanding their goals, and working hard to craft solution-focused designs allows us to create beautifully crafted, functional living spaces.
OUR TEAM
The Hausvio is made of professional, experienced carpenters with over a decade in the industry. Each member is well-known and admired in their field for exceptional quality, attention to detail, and talent. We also collaborate with other local professionals, including Architects, Engineers, Kitchen & Bathroom Designers, Electricians, Plumbers, and other specialized personnel, to guarantee we are providing the highest level of service and care for our clients.

MEET THE FOUNDER
Owner/ CEO Wilson is a Licenced Professional Engineer with over five years of experience in the home renovation field. Wilson is passionate about implementing the best methods and practices to help reduce Hausvio’s carbon footprint.

Hausvio is pursuing a LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) Certificate. LEED is the most widely used green building rating system in Canada and across the globe. LEED is a proven and holistic path to addressing climate change. At Hausvio, we’re committed to creating more resource-efficient, healthy, and resilient homes without compromising design aesthetics, quality, or living convenience.

WHY GO GREEN
Protects Our Ecosystem: Efficient Use of Resources & Energy
Healthier Indoor Environment: Improved Quality of Life
Energy-Efficient: Reduced Operational Cost and Maintenance
Lower Maintenance and Operation Costs
Reduces Strain on Local Resources
services:
Our Services
Your home should perfectly reflect your style, taste, and lifestyle. We listen to your needs, goals, and visions and flawlessly align them with the best building practices to deliver the best possible outcomes for your living spaces.
Kitchen
The kitchen is the heartbeat of the home. At Hausvio, we create kitchens that work for your family, design choices, and your way of living. From contemporary and modern renovations to open concepts and traditional styles, Hausvio works with you to create beautiful, functional kitchens that complement your home’s aesthetic. 
 
Bathroom
Create a luxurious sanctuary in your home. Bathrooms are a place where you can relax, refresh, and rejuvenate. Our team has experience remodeling various bathroom styles, including ensuites, power rooms, and main bathrooms. Whether you want to create a spa-like oasis with a thermostatic shower system or just refresh your cabinetry, our team can help. 
Whole House
Let us help you make your house a home. If you need significant upgrades to your living space to make it work for you and your family, we offer complete house renovations. Typically, whole house renovations include major elements like the kitchen, bathrooms, interior finishes, flooring, and mechanical systems (electrical, plumbing, and HVAC). 
Basement
Finished basements add additional living space while significantly increasing your property value. We offer fully customizable basement renovations to fit your needs. Our team can add vital functional living space and much-needed storage to upgrade your lifestyle. To add even more value to your home, talk to us about including sub-flooring, lighting, a wet bar, laundry room, built-ins, and upgrading insulation.
